abstract: A panel advises against prostate screening for healthy men, why the latest iPhone looks the same, hotels join the flash mob fad and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
snippet: A panel advises against prostate screening for healthy men, why the latest iPhone looks the same, hotels join the flash mob fad and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: A variety of consumer-focused articles appears daily in The New York Times and online in our blogs. Each weekday morning, we gather them together here so you can quickly scan the news that could hit you in your wallet.

headline.main: Friday Reading: Panel Advises No Prostate Test for Healthy Men
